architecture_decisions.metallic-as-final-design: User explicitly confirmed metallic theme will be part of final design - not experimental. Creates distinctive industrial/hardware aesthetic that differentiates product.
architecture_decisions.pure-css-approach: Avoided JavaScript-based animations or libraries - pure CSS ensures maximum performance and simplicity. All effects use GPU-accelerated properties (transform, opacity).
architecture_decisions.layered-shadow-strategy: Multiple box-shadow layers (outer glow, inner highlight, inner shadow) create realistic metal depth - technique applicable across all interactive elements.
